topic.title: Search engines
topic.body: What 0net search engine do you use? Kaffeine seems stagnant.

topic.title: Up for a little treasure hunt?
topic.body:
I've together a little bit of a treasure hunt :) it's not very difficult really but it'll be nice if you like puzzles. If you want to play, here's the first clue: https://imgur.com/a/WarsUaM

First place: robione
Second place: ozcodex
Third place: jupadr

topic.title: "Is the US about to split the internet?" - will be interesting to see whether ZN can continue connecting people across the world

1595367284_1EdFvRMCSsjRQDSwKEaYDu3aU2o5P.body:
> [ozcodex](#comment_3_1KSLXqsmQeM7DFX6u18gjrUzaSFYafSCk5): nah, i get stuck on the first step.... i will try tommorrow more possible passwords, but is a bit un clear the clue, and the passwor can have some case, and that makes it a nightmare, the place?the person?where the place is? idk

DM'd you a small clue lol

> [robione](#comment_570_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): It's been solved.

oxcodex is thinking about making another treasure hunt :)

> [robione](#comment_571_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): So will you be listing the first few folks who solved it?

Yeah I put the people who solved it in the original post :), only 2 so far

1596284934_12BoU1NpWC9niVqBeRueg6Mox5Peh.body: COVID-19 stands for (CO)rona(VI)rus (D)isease 20(19). Stop listening to conspiracies, they're a distraction from the things that are really hurting people. I suggest reading information on how ID can help people around the world. Do you know that in some places, 40% of people do not even have their birth certificate; if you have no ID it must be incredibly difficult to get on in life.

1579853774_1GDtf6kkYiCtruw42QmAeaHG1HsrW.body: There is no such thing as the CCP (Chinese Communist Party). It's actually called the Communist Party of China (CPC) and it has lifted half a billion people out of extreme poverty in recent years. Nothing in the world is totally good or totally bad.

1596865203_1EdFvRMCSsjRQDSwKEaYDu3aU2o5P.body:
> [thorburn](#comment_95_1Q2noE3qu7ccvEspqWWv4xkMktiqp6mhdK): Why point ZN users to the WHO website? The WHO is available on the clear net and it's part of the problem ffs!

I don't know how to put it here.

1611909944_1HTbdyz4zToxkxfmuYYfNVN1Y3U2y.body:
> [jager](#comment_61_1MCNYstff4yDsoNktn2MzGbtsCHqnRxHWX): LOL why did you get it? Unless you have some severe critical comorbidity, getting the COVID vaccine demonstrates a total lack of understanding of the risk statistics.

Even if you do not show symptoms you can be carrying the virus allowing it to jump to someone else who dies.
